data.meta_description: ISBN: 9781932030167 - Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Wormhole Books, Fort Wayne, IN - 2003 - Condition: Fine - Well, if you're looking for this book, congratulations, you've found it ? and kudos for pursuing it. You're in for a weird and rewarding reading experience, liberally spiked with references to Alfred Bester's life and works, and illustrated by the author's fascinating artwork. This is the limited edition hardcover (issued without a dustjacket), #148 of 250, signed on its limitation page by author/artist Brett Bertholf. This copy has been gently read once, and is still in fine condition. Binding is square and sound, with a bound-in ribbon marker that's shiny and unworn. Covers are unworn and unmarked. Pages are unworn and unmarked (other than the hand-written number and author's signature on the limitation page,) Also included is the Wormhole Books bookmark, which features a recipe for Farenheit Fondue. As with all Space Age Book purchases, I will ship this book in a moisture proof zip-loc bag, padded in bubble wrap, inside a sturdy box to assure it reaches its new owner in the same condition as my description. - alfred Bester is alivE and well and livinG in wiNterset, iowa [SIGNED]
data.text:
About this Item

Well, if you're looking for this book, congratulations, you've found it ? and kudos for pursuing it. You're in for a weird and rewarding reading experience, liberally spiked with references to Alfred Bester's life and works, and illustrated by the author's fascinating artwork. This is the limited edition hardcover (issued without a dustjacket), #148 of 250, signed on its limitation page by author/artist Brett Bertholf. This copy has been gently read once, and is still in fine condition. Binding is square and sound, with a bound-in ribbon marker that's shiny and unworn. Covers are unworn and unmarked. Pages are unworn and unmarked (other than the hand-written number and author's signature on the limitation page,) Also included is the Wormhole Books bookmark, which features a recipe for Farenheit Fondue. As with all Space Age Book purchases, I will ship this book in a moisture proof zip-loc bag, padded in bubble wrap, inside a sturdy box to assure it reaches its new owner in the same condition as my description. Seller Inventory # 002343

Contact seller
